### [Delgosha](https://github.com/mcnakhaee/delgosha)

[![Lifecycle:
experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)
Delgosha is an opinionated package which aims to provide a collection of
ggplot2 themes for RTL languages (mostly Persian).

### [Dadegan](https://github.com/mcnakhaee/dadegan)
================
Dadegan is a simple package which contains a handful of useful Persian datasets.
